Package com.ktzvhad.rents.dao

Class H2Dao

java.lang.Object
com.ktzvhad.rents.repository.DonatorsRepository
@Repository public class H2Dao extends Object
The H2Dao class is responsible for handling all database operations for the H2 database. This includes CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on the 'ateret' table and any other necessary data manipulation required by the application. This class utilizes JdbcTemplate for database interactions, simplifying JDBC operations and converting SQL exceptions into Spring's DataAccessException hierarchy.

  • Method Details

    • writeToH2

      public void writeToH2(List<Map<String,Object>> data)
      Inserts a list of donation data into the 'ateret' table. Maps each donation record from the provided list into the table's columns.
      Parameters:
      data - List of maps, each representing a donation record with key-value pairs corresponding to column names and values.

    • getAllH2DonateData

      public List<DonatorResponse> getAllH2DonateData()
      Retrieves all donation data from the 'ateret' table and maps it to a list of DonatorResponse objects.
      Returns:
      List of DonatorResponse objects representing the retrieved donation records.

    • generateFilteredReport

      public List<ReportDTO> generateFilteredReport()
      Generates a report of donations, aggregating data by donor name and calculating the maximum current amount donated. Assigns unique numbers to each donor based on their appearance in the unique_numbers table.
      Returns:
      List of ReportDTO objects containing the aggregated donation data and unique numbers for each donor.

    • deleteRowById

      public boolean deleteRowById(Long id)
      Deletes a donation record from the 'ateret' table based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the donation record to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the operation affected one or more rows, indicating successful deletion; false otherwise.

    • editRowById

      public boolean editRowById(Long id, DonatorResponse donatorResponse)
      Updates a donation record in the 'ateret' table based on the provided ID and DonatorResponse object.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the donation record to update.
      donatorResponse - DonatorResponse object containing the updated donation data.
      Returns:
      true if the operation affected one or more rows, indicating successful update; false otherwise.
